section.title: Myrddin MushCron
section.paragraph: Load in the Myrddin Mush Cron. It’s a very handy piece of software and

block_quote.paragraph: strongly suggested to do so. You can find this in the ‘Mushcode’ directory off the main Rhost directory. Filename: ~/Rhost/Mushcode/MyrddinCRON

definition_list_item.term: @chown/preserve the myrddin mush cron to immholder, then move to maste room.

definition.paragraph: Note: the globalroom() function returns the dbref# of the master room. Handy!

section.paragraph: @chown/pres Myrddin=*Immholder @tel Myrddin=#234 (where #234 is the dbref# of your code closet)

section.title: Myrddin BBS
Other Mushcode
section.paragraph: There’s other code in the Mushcode directory that you are welcome to install. You would follow similar procedures for loading it in, chowning it, and moving to the master room as you did above.
Likewise, any softcode you find on the internet or on other mushes should be portable to RhostMUSH with little to no changes depending on the complexity of the code in question.
